goal.ch: 本課程是一門深度學習研究所課程，理論與實務並重，一開始將完整介紹神經網路如何學習，進而帶入深度學習。深度學習方面，將介紹各種重要應用與模型，包含分類問題、圖像切割問題、時間序列問題等，並搭配期末專題，以期培養學生整合理論與實務的能力。
goal.en: This course is a deep learning research institute course, with equal emphasis on theory and practice. At the beginning, it will fully introduce how the neural network learns, and then bring it into deep learning. In terms of deep learning, various important applications and models will be introduced, including classification problems, image cutting problems, time series problems, etc., and will be matched with final topics to cultivate students' ability to integrate theory and practice.

outline.ch:
1課程簡介、機器學習介紹
2神經網路介紹
3神經網路學習模式
4卷積網路
5深度學習訓練模式，各種參數設定
6監督式學習網路：分類問題1
7監督式學習網路：分類問題2
8監督式學習網路：物件偵測與辨識1
9監督式學習網路：物件偵測與辨識2
10監督式學習網路：影像分割
11監督式學習網路：時序列問題分析
12非監督式學習網路：Autoencoders、GANs
13增強式學習介紹
14增強式學習：Policy-based Approach、Value-based Approach
15各種新型深度學習模型探討1
16各種新型深度學習模型探討2
17學生專題報告與Demo
outline.en:
1 Course Introduction, Introduction to Machine Learning
2 Introduction to Neural Networks
3 Neural Network Learning Mode
4 Convolutional Networks
5 deep learning training mode, various parameter settings
6 Supervised Learning Networks: Classification Problem 1
7 Supervised Learning Networks: Classification Problem 2
8 Supervised Learning Networks: Object Detection and Recognition 1
9 Supervised Learning Networks: Object Detection and Recognition 2
10 Supervised Learning Networks: Image Segmentation
11 Supervised Learning Networks: Analysis of Time Series Problems
12 Unsupervised Learning Networks: Autoencoders, GANs
13 Introduction to Reinforcement Learning
14 Enhanced Learning: Policy-based Approach, Value-based Approach
15 Discussion on various new deep learning models 1
16 Discussion on various new deep learning models 2
17 Student Reports and Demos

(Deep learning 深度學習必讀, 作者：Keras 原創者 François Chollet 著、葉欣睿 譯、 施威銘研究室 監修)
Publisher ‏ : ‎ Manning (December 7, 2021)
Publication date ‏ : ‎ December 7, 2021

Print length ‏ : ‎ 503 pages

gradMethod.en: Mid-term exam: 30%, final exam: 30%, homework (including quiz): 30%, classroom performance: 10%
